00005    Helper function to create a SDL_thread of a member function

00016 template <class ThisType, class FuncType>
00017 struct MethodInfo {
00018         static int Stub(void *_Info) {
00019 
00020                 //Dynamic thread creates pointer to the functype
00021                 //which means it should be destroyed after function end
00022                 //however if thread is killed it is not called and memory leak is found
00023                 #ifdef _DYNAMIC_THREAD_
00024 
00025                         MethodInfo <ThisType, FuncType> *Info;
00026 
00027                         Info = (MethodInfo <ThisType, FuncType> *)(_Info);
00028 
00029                         ((Info->This)->*(Info->Func))();
00030 
00031                         delete Info;
00032 
00033                 //the static thread fixes this problem by using variable generated on the
00034                 //stack which means it is created and destroyed automaticly
00035                 //so no memory leak is found
00036                 #else //_STATIC_THREAD_
00037 
00038                         MethodInfo <ThisType, FuncType> Info;
00039 
00040                         Info            = *(MethodInfo <ThisType, FuncType> *)(_Info);
00041 
00042                         delete (MethodInfo <ThisType, FuncType> *)(_Info);
00043 
00044                         ((Info.This)->*(Info.Func))();
00045 
00046                 #endif
00047 
00048                 //delete Info;
00049                 return 0;
00050         }
00051 
00052 
00053 
00054         ThisType *This;
00055         FuncType Func;
00056 
00057         MethodInfo(ThisType *_This, FuncType _F) : This(_This), Func(_F) {}
00058         MethodInfo(){};
00059 };
00060 
00061 
00062 
00063 template <class ThisType, class FuncType>
00064 SDL_Thread* SDL_CreateMemberThread(ThisType *This, FuncType Func) {
00065 
00066         MethodInfo <ThisType,FuncType> *Info;
00067 
00068         Info = new MethodInfo <ThisType,FuncType> (This,Func);
00069 
00070         return SDL_CreateThread(( int(*)(void *) )(MethodInfo<ThisType,FuncType>::Stub),Info);
00071 
00072 
00073 }

00075 #endif // MEMBERTHREADS_H_INCLUDED
